sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Document } from '../document.model'; @Component({ selector: 'cms-document-edit', templateUrl: './document-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./document-edit.component.css'], }) export class DocumentEditComponent implements OnInit { originalDocument: Document; document: Document = null; editMode: boolean = false; constructor() {} ngOnInit() {} onCancel() {} }
